resources.string:
ॐ तत् सत्। Shall we update your Stardict dictionary files?
 This program downloads latest dictionary files from the internet, and stores it in the SDCARD/dictdata folder, for Stardict apps to use. 
 Please scroll + select the dictionary lists you want to use, then click the button. (Details: http://bit.ly/dict-update-app ).
!!!Don\'t navigate away or we\'ll need to restart!!!
"Added %d dictionary urls. Pick the dictionaries to install."
We\'re done!! Get a stardict-compatible dictionary app (eg: Goldendict paid, ColorDict), if you don\'t already have one. Then reindex all your dictionaries.
\n Do you want to try again?
Installing dictionaries. Please wait. \n !!Don\'t navigate away or we\'ll have to restart.!!\n

Based on what we remember installing (%1d dicts) from earlier runs of this app (>= 2.9) on this device, we have auto-unselected ~ %2d dictionaries which don\'t seem to be new or updated. You can reselect.
